name: CubeSlide (WayWorze)
description:
CubeSlide is a game where you play as a cube, manoeuvring through obstacles as you slide across the ground to reach the end. There are a total of 5 levels and the game gets increasingly harder as more and more obstacles appear in your path.

How to play:

Press [A] and [D] to move left and right

This is my very first Unity game! You can access it by clicking on "Run game" on the top of the screen

Made with the help of Brackeys' Unity Tutorial :D
